text:
Since i'm in the university, i discovery so many concepts, how the society start and how she continues to dominated all population. The human exploit other humans what is learn at the university, some injustice. Now i can see, find how people react or arguing for their interest. The most important thing is to see how people or group react or act on front of troubles. The troubles show us who is really this people. The society are individual, all of us want to have big capital or a big bank account.
When i learn this many concepts i have big hole in my mind because i has to do “clean all” in my head for a good learning and don’t be influenced by society. Now i know how people are when he do that because many emotions or act are just planned by the society, and how he will be react to this actions. i’m sad to know that now but it’s very important to look if people are good or not. But now i have many knowledges and i know it’s not possible to say what is bad or good because the society decided that and the society can control all of us. When we aren’t know how society is , the society choose for you. All of yours mind are the society because we are the specific people with some judgements, discrimination on you physically or mentally.
But now we know how society is and i don’t want to enter on this. and i will leave in the peace place without authority or “president” just our place not their, the society.
